name: socket.io.users
description: This module finds and manages which socket is from who and visa versa. One user per person. User means: Unlimited (new) browser tabs/windows but same machine. OR You can pass custom authorized id and have one user with it's sockets per group of different machines.
author: Makis Maropoulos <makis@ideopod.com> (https://github.com/kataras)
